text: Alan Willis Thicke (born Alan Willis Jeffery; March 1, 1947 â€“ December 13, 2016) was a Canadian actor, songwriter, and game and talk show host. He was known for his role as Jason Seaver, the father on the ABC television series Growing Pains. He was the father of singer Robin Thicke. Thicke died at his home in Burbank, California on December 13, 2016 from a sudden Aortic dissection, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Alan Thicke in NNDB * Alan Thicke in biography.com Category:1947 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Ontario Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian songwriters Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Deaths from aortic dissection Category:Writers from Ontario
title: Alan Thicke
